SELECT id, refund_id, delivery_type, delivery_company, delivery_sn, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, delivery_time, receive_time, create_time, update_time, deleted FROM refund_delivery
AND refund_id LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.refundId}, '%')
AND delivery_type LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.deliveryType}, '%')
AND delivery_company LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.deliveryCompany}, '%')
AND delivery_sn LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.deliverySn}, '%')
AND receiver_name LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.receiverName}, '%')
AND receiver_phone LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.receiverPhone}, '%')
